subject: Design Request: Merchant Communication Templates for Upcoming Smartphone Launches

custom_fields.cf_s:
Greetings Team,
I hope this message finds you well.

We have a set of upcoming brand launches across select merchants, and we’d like to ensure timely and impactful communication to these merchants around the launch window.

To provide clarity on the request, please find below the communication touchpoints we want to cover:

Request Details:

Creative Type: WhatsApp Broadcast & Screensaver

Languages: English

Banner Count: 2 (Launch Day, One Day After Launch)

Priority: High

Launch Window: 9th August to 20th August 2025

Key Touchpoints:

One Day Before Launch – Build excitement and readiness

Launch Day – Announce go-live and highlight key benefits

One Day After Launch – Reinforce availability and usage push

Launch Schedule for Next 15 Days (Tentative Dates):

Date	Festival/Holiday	Product Launch
9 Aug	Raksha Bandhan	Redmi 15C (budget smartphone)
12 Aug	-	Vivo V60 (camera-centric phone, AMOLED 120Hz)
First week	-	OPPO K13 Turbo & Turbo Pro (gaming-centric phones)
20 Aug	-	Google Pixel 10 Series (Pixel 10, 10 Pro, 10 Pro XL, 10 Pro Fold)
Mid Aug	-	Tecno Camon 40 Pro, Itel S25 Ultra (budget)

Could you please share a template for these communication banners that we can use as a base? We will tweak the content for each smartphone launch accordingly.

Looking forward to your support!
